meanings.definition: A large cemetery or burial ground, especially one belonging to an ancient city.
meanings.sent1: The ancient necropolises were filled with tombs and monuments.
meanings.sent2: Visitors often explore the necropolises to learn about the history of the city.
meanings.sent3: The necropolises were so crowded that even the ghosts had to wait in line.
meanings.sent4: The necropolises stood like silent guardians of the past, watching over the city.
meanings.sent5: The necropolises stretched far and wide, a testament to the lives once lived there.

meanings.definition: A city of the dead; a cemetery.
meanings.sent1: The necropolises were peaceful places where the departed found their eternal rest.
meanings.sent2: Families gathered at the necropolises to honor their ancestors.
meanings.sent3: The necropolises at night seemed to come alive with whispers of the past.
meanings.sent4: In the necropolises, time seemed to stand still, preserving memories of the deceased.
meanings.sent5: The necropolises were like open books, telling stories of those who once walked the earth.
